title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Crescent Mine Grade – Park City, Utah
content:
Photo submitted by Neil Macc, “Here is my photo submission for Photo of the Day. I was riding the local Park City trail system and coming down the CMG trail at about 20 mph when this moose jumped onto the trail in front of me running. About 300 feet later it stopped at a trail […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Crescent Mine Grade – Park City, Utah appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
